document.docAuthor: Tkoč, Michal, Pecharová, Martina & Ježek, Jan
document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of the type specimens of Diptera deposited in the Department of Entomology, National Museum, Prague, Czech Republic *

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of the type specimens of Diptera deposited in the Department of Entomology, National Museum, Prague, Czech Republic *

subSubSection.paragraph: (http://www.morphbank.net/?id=840028)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Clytocerus ( Boreoclytocerus ) splendidus Ježek & Hájek, 2007: 244
, Figs 21–41.

subSubSection.paragraph: The holotype and 24 paratypes are deposited in NMPC:

Alnus, Picea ,
